m_szDocTitle: BMW Won't Release Next i Series Model Plug-In Until After 2020 | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: March 24th, 2015 by James Ayre   The next model in BMW’s i series won’t be arriving before 2020, based on recent comments from the company’s head of R&D. So while we got both the i3 and the i8 in relatively fast succession, and BMW has announced plans to electrify every model in its fleet, it looks like BMW will be taking its time in taking that line of inquiry (from-the-ground-up electric cars) any further. The company has reportedly only just begun the brainstorming process for the third model in the series.
